1001.name: Boots of Speed
1001.description:
Limited to 1.

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

1039.name: Hunter's Machete
1039.description:
UNIQUE Passive - Maim: Basic attacks deal 10 bonus magic damage to monsters on hit.
UNIQUE Passive - Butcher: Damage dealt to monsters increased by 10%.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
1039.plaintext: Slightly increases damage dealt to neutral monsters

1054.name: Doran's Shield
1054.description:
+100 Health
+10 Health Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 8 damage from champion basic attacks.

1055.name: Doran's Blade
1055.description:
+80 Health
+10 Attack Damage

Passive: Basic attacks restore 5 Health on hit.

1056.name: Doran's Ring
1056.description:
+60 Health
+15 Ability Power
+3 Mana Regen per 5 seconds

Passive: Restores 4 Mana upon killing a unit.

1062.name: Prospector's Blade
1062.description:
+20 Attack Damage
+5% Life Steal

UNIQUE Passive - Prospector: +200 Health

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

1063.name: Prospector's Ring
1063.description:
+40 Ability Power
+10 Mana Regeneration

UNIQUE Passive - Prospector: +200 Health

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

1080.name: Spirit Stone
1080.description:
+14 Health Regen per 5 seconds
+7 Mana Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Maim: Basic attacks deal 10 bonus magic damage to monsters on hit.
UNIQUE Passive - Butcher: Damage dealt to monsters increased by 20%.

(Unique Passives or Actives with the same name don't stack.)
1080.plaintext: Moderately increases damage dealt to neutral monsters

2003.name: Health Potion
2003.description:
Limited to 5 at one time.

Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.
2003.plaintext: Consume to restore Health over time

2004.name: Mana Potion
2004.description:
Limited to 5 at one time.

Click to Consume: Restores 100 Mana over 15 seconds.
2004.plaintext: Consume to restore Mana over time

2009.name: Total Biscuit of Rejuvenation
2009.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Restores 80 Health and 50 Mana over 10 seconds.

2037.name: Elixir of Fortitude
2037.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Grants +120-235 Health based on level and +15 Attack Damage for 3 minutes.
2037.plaintext: Temporarily increases Attack Damage and Health

2039.name: Elixir of Brilliance
2039.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Grants +25-40 Ability Power based on level and +10% Cooldown Reduction for 3 minutes.
2039.plaintext: Temporarily increases Ability Power and Cooldown Reduction

2040.name: Ichor of Rage
2040.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Grants +20-42 Attack Damage based on level, +20-42% Attack Speed based on level, and 15% increased damage to turrets for 4 minutes.
2040.plaintext: Temporarily increases Attack Damage, Attack Speed, and increases damage to turrets

2041.name: Crystalline Flask
2041.description:
UNIQUE Passive: Holds 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 120 Health and 60 Mana over 12 seconds.
2041.plaintext: Restores Health and Mana over time, refills at shop

2042.name: Oracle's Elixir
2042.description:
Click to Consume: Grants detection of nearby invisible units for up to 4 minutes.

(Revealing a ward in this manner grants a portion of the gold reward when that unit is killed.)
2042.plaintext: Allows champion to see invisible units

2043.name: Vision Ward
2043.description:
Click to Consume: Places an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area and invisible units in the area for 3 minutes.

(Revealing a ward in this manner grants a portion of the gold reward when that unit is killed.)
2043.plaintext: Use to temporarily provide vision and stealth detection in an area

2044.name: Sight Ward
2044.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Places an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area for 3 minutes.
2044.plaintext: Use to temporarily provide vision in an area

2045.name: Ruby Sightstone
2045.description:
+360 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Ward Refresh: Holds 5 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE Active - Ghost Ward: Consumes a charge to place an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area for 3 minutes (maximum 3 wards placed from this item at once).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
2045.plaintext: Greatly increases Health and provides Sight Wards over time

2047.name: Oracle's Extract
2047.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Grants detection of nearby invisible units for up to 5 minutes or until death.
2047.plaintext: Allows champion to see invisible units

2048.name: Ichor of Illumination
2048.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Grants +30-64 Ability Power based on level, +15% Cooldown Reduction, and increased Mana and Energy regeneration for 4 minutes.
2048.plaintext: Temporarily increases Ability Power, Cooldown Reduction, Mana and Energy Regeneration

2049.name: Sightstone
2049.description:
+180 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Ward Refresh: Holds 4 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE Active - Ghost Ward: Consumes a charge to place an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area for 3 minutes (maximum 2 wards placed from this item at once).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
2049.plaintext: Increases Health and provides Sight Wards over time

2050.name: Explorer's Ward
2050.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Places an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area for 60 seconds.

2051.name: Guardian's Horn
2051.description:
+180 Health
+12 Health Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive: Enemy spellcasts reduce the cooldown of Battle Cry by 1 second.
UNIQUE Active - Battle Cry: Gain 30% movement speed, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resistance for 3 seconds. 25 second cooldown.
2051.plaintext: Activate for Movement Speed and a defensive boost

2052.name: Poro-Snax
2052.description:
This savory blend of free-range, grass-fed Avarosan game hens and organic, non-ZMO Freljordian herbs contains the essential nutrients necessary to keep your Poro purring with pleasure.

All proceeds will be donated towards fighting Noxian animal cruelty.

3001.name: Abyssal Scepter
3001.description:
+70 Ability Power
+45 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Magic Resist of nearby enemies by 20.

3003.description:
+250 Mana
+60 Ability Power
+10 Mana Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +8 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast and Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds). Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3003.plaintext: Increases Ability Power based on maximum Mana

3004.name: Manamune
3004.description:
+250 Mana
+20 Attack Damage
+7 Mana Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% of maximum Mana.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +4 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each basic attack, spell cast, and Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds).

Transforms into Muramana at +750 Mana.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3004.plaintext: Increases Attack Damage based on maximum Mana

3005.name: Atma's Impaler
3005.description:
+45 Armor
+15% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 1.5% of maximum Health.
3005.plaintext: Increases Attack Damage based on maximum Health

+20% Attack Speed

+10 Mana Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +10 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast and Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 6 seconds). Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

+250 Mana

+7 Mana Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +8 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each basic attack, spell cast, and Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 6 seconds).

Transforms into Muramana at +750 Mana.

+200 Health

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

+15 Magic Penetration

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

3022.description:
+700 Health
+30 Attack Damage

+40 Ability Power
+40 Magic Resist
+6% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Active - Hunt: Summons up to 2 invulnerable ghosts that seek out the two nearest enemy champions for 6 seconds. If a ghost reaches its target, it reveals the target and reduces their Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds (120 second cooldown).

+50 Armor
+40 Magic Resist

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

+1000 Mana

+20 Ability Power

+1000 Mana

+30 Armor

+400 Health

+250 Health
+10 Health Regen per 5 seconds

+250 Mana
+7 Mana Regen per 5 seconds

+200 Health
+50 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion reduces their Armor by 5% for 4 seconds (stacks up to 5 times, up to 25%).

(Armor Penetration: Physical damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Armor equal to Armor Penetration.)

+70 Attack Damage
+12% Life Steal

3073.name: Tear of the Goddess (Crystal Scar)

+250 Mana
+7 Mana Regen per 5 seconds

3073.plaintext: Increases maximum Mana as Mana is spent

UNIQUE Active - Crescent: Deals 60% to 100% of total Attack Damage as physical damage to nearby enemy units (closest enemies take the most damage) (10 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3074.plaintext: Melee attacks hit nearby enemies, dealing damage and restoring Health

3075.name: Thornmail

+100 Armor

3077.name: Tiamat (Melee Only)

+40 Attack Damage
+15 Health Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Cleave: Basic attacks deal 20% to 60% of total Attack Damage as bonus physical damage to enemies near the target on hit (enemies closest to the target take the most damage).
UNIQUE Active - Crescent: Deals 60% to 100% of total Attack Damage as physical damage to nearby enemy units (closest enemies take the most damage) (10 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

+30 Attack Damage

+200 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Icy: Basic attacks have a 25% chance to slow target's Movement Speed for 2 seconds on hit (30% slow for melee attacks, 20% slow for ranged attacks).
UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 150% of base Attack Damage on hit (2 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

3082.name: Warden's Mail

+50 Armor

+20 Health Regen per 5 seconds

3115.name: Nashor's Tooth
3115.description:
+50% Attack Speed
+60 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: +20% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 15 (+15% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage on hit.

3116.name: Rylai's Crystal Scepter
3116.description:
+500 Health
+80 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing spell damage slows the target's Movement Speed by 35% for 1.5 seconds (15% for multi-target and damage-over-time spells).

3117.name: Boots of Mobility
3117.description:
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed. Increases to +105 Movement Speed when out of combat for 5 seconds.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3117.plaintext: Greatly enhances Movement Speed when out of combat

3123.name: Executioner's Calling
3123.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+20% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks inflict Grievous Wounds on enemy champions for 1.5 seconds on hit.

(Grievous Wounds reduces healing and regeneration by 50%.)
3123.plaintext: Basic attacks reduce enemy healing and Health Regen

3124.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
3124.description:
+30 Attack Damage
+40 Ability Power

Passive: Basic attacks (on attack) and spell casts grant +4% Attack Speed and +4 Ability Power for 8 seconds (stacks up to 8 times).
UNIQUE Passive: Falling below 50% Health grants +20% Attack Speed, +10% Life Steal, and +10% Spell Vamp until out of combat (30 second cooldown).
3124.plaintext: Increases Ability Power and Attack Damage

3128.name: Deathfire Grasp
3128.description:
+120 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Active: Deals 15% of target champion's maximum Health in magic damage and increases all subsequent magic damage taken by the target by 20% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).
3128.plaintext: Activate to increase all magic damage dealt to an enemy champion

3131.name: Sword of the Divine
3131.description:
+45% Attack Speed

Passive: This item does not grant any Attack Speed while on cooldown. Champion kills reduce the current cooldown by 50%.
UNIQUE Active: Grants +100% Attack Speed and 100% Critical Strike Chance for 3 seconds or 3 critical strikes (60 second cooldown).
3131.plaintext: Activate to gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for a short duration

3134.name: The Brutalizer
3134.description:
+25 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: +10% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive: +10 Armor Penetration

(Armor Penetration: Physical damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Armor equal to Armor Penetration.)
3134.plaintext: Increases physical damage and Cooldown Reduction

3135.name: Void Staff
3135.description:
+70 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Magic damage ignores 35% of the target's Magic Resist (applies before Magic Penetration).

3136.name: Haunting Guise

+200 Health

+60 Attack Damage
+45 Magic Resist

+45 Magic Resist

3141.name: Sword of the Occult

+10 Attack Damage

3142.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
3142.description:
+30 Attack Damage
+15% Critical Strike Chance
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: +20 Armor Penetration
UNIQUE Active: Grants +20% Movement Speed and +40% Attack Speed (lasts 6 seconds for melee champions, 4 seconds for ranged champions) (45 second cooldown).

(Armor Penetration: Physical damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Armor equal to Armor Penetration.)

3143.name: Randuin's Omen
3143.description:
+500 Health
+70 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15% and Movement Speed by 10% for 1 seconds.
UNIQUE Active: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemy units by 35% for 2 seconds (+1 second per 200 Armor and +1 second per 200 Magic Resist) (60 second cooldown).

+45 Attack Damage

3151.name: Liandry's Torment
3151.description:
+50 Ability Power
+300 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration
UNIQUE Passive: Dealing spell damage applies a damage-over-time effect for 3 seconds that deals bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's current Health per second. This bonus damage is doubled against movement-impaired units and capped at 100 damage per second vs. monsters.

(A unit is movement-impaired if it is slowed, stunned, taunted, feared, or immobilized.)

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

+50 Ability Power

3153.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+40% Attack Speed
+15% Life Steal

UNIQUE Passive: Rengar collects trophies when killing champions and gains bonus effects based on how many trophies he collects. Grants 1 trophy for kills and assists. One trophy is lost upon death.
3 Trophies: +10 Armor Penetration, +5% Cooldown Reduction

9 Trophies: Increases the range of Rengar's leap by 150.
14 Trophies: Increases the duration of Thrill of the Hunt by 3 seconds. Additionally, Rengar's next ability used after activating Thrill of the Hunt generates 1 bonus Ferocity.

3264.description:
Limited to 1 of each enchantment type.
Enchants boots to have Alacrity bonus.

UNIQUE Passive - Alacrity: +15 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

3265.name: Enchantment: Homeguard
3265.description:
Limited to 1 of each enchantment type.
Enchants boots to have Homeguard bonus.

UNIQUE Passive - Homeguard: After being out of combat for 8 seconds, visiting the shop grants full Health, Mana, and +200% Movement Speed that decays over 8 seconds (bonus Movement Speed ends upon entering combat).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

3266.name: Enchantment: Captain
3266.description:
Limited to 1 of each enchantment type.
Enchants boots to have Captain bonus.

UNIQUE Passive - Captain: Grants +8% Movement Speed to nearby approaching allied champions. Grants nearby minions +20% Movement Speed.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

3267.name: Enchantment: Furor
3267.description:
Limited to 1 of each enchantment type.
Enchants boots to have Furor bonus.

UNIQUE Passive - Furor: Upon dealing damage with a single target spell or attack (on hit), grants +12% Movement Speed that decays over 2 seconds.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

3268.name: Enchantment: Distortion
3268.description:
Limited to 1 of each enchantment type.
Enchants boots to have Distortion bonus.

UNIQUE Passive - Distortion: Teleport, Flash, and Ghost summoner spell cooldowns are reduced by 25%.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
